questions.question: The coordinates of sinusoidal transfer function of a polar plot is ____.

explanations.a: plot of the magnitude G(jω) versus the phase angle of G(jω)
explanations.b: should be magnitude and phase angle
explanations.c: should be magnitude and phase angle

questions.question: The polar plot of a transfer function that passes through the critical point (-1,0) has a gain margin of _________.
The stability of the system cannot be predicted based on the position of poles.

explanations.b: poles and the zeros of a system determine whether the system is stable

questions.question: The gain margin of the system is becomes half when the gain of the open-loop system is doubled.

explanations.b: the gain margin also gets doubled
